p: Antinociceptive results are expressed as the mean ± S.E.M. of the analysis of area under the curve (AUC, time of licking against time, sec × min) of mice ( n = 6), for phases 1 and 2, and both, or as the mean ± S.E.M. of licking time (sec) of mice ( n = 6) in time courses ( Supplementary Materials). Statistical differences were evaluated using either one way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s in the GraphPad Prism software (version 7; GraphPad Inc., La Jolla, CA, USA).
